long_description: Find your center during yoga practice in the comfort of the REI Sariska tights. They offer light warmth with soft, stretchy fabric that wicks moisture when you're working hard. Nylon and spandex fabric offers moisture-wicking comfort and a touch of warmth to take the chill off as you warm up. Side seams wrap from back to front to avoid abrasion points during side floor poses, and flat seams enhance comfort. Flattering fold-over elastic waistband offers a comfortable fit and features extra width for coverage during yoga poses where you stretch and bend. Tulip cuff ankles offer a feminine touch. The REI Sariska tights have an active fit that won't bind or twist.
short_description: Find your center during yoga practice in the comfort of the REI Sariska tights. They offer light warmth with soft, stretchy fabric that wicks moisture when you're working hard.
